description: A basic general knowledge quiz to test your knowledge.

questions.question: What is the capital of France?
questions.explanation: Paris is the capital city of France.

questions.question: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.explanation: Mars is called the Red Planet because of its reddish appearance.

questions.question: What is the largest mammal?
questions.explanation: The blue whale is the largest animal ever known to have lived on Earth.
